meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to one square meter.
meanings.sent1: The garden measured ten centiares in size.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted crops on several centiares of land.
meanings.sent3: The centiares of grass in the park seemed to grow overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening covered every centiare of her backyard.
meanings.sent5: The real estate agent emphasized the spaciousness of the property by mentioning its many centiares.
